channel.title: Scrolls (Mojang's new game)
channel.description:
Ah, I forgot! We also announced our new game today! There’s not much info yet, but we’ll be getting an alpha version out as soon as we can! Scrolls! I figure most people reading this blog cares mostly about Minecraft development, so let me just say that I won’t be involved in the day to day development of Scrolls. Jakob, one of the guys I started Mojang with, is developing it, and has been since we started the company. Still, I hope many of you will check it out once we’ve got some more stuff to show! posted 4 weeks ago
It's a new game which will be developed by Mojang, but thankfully the development won't take Notch's mind off MineCrat (according to him anyway). It sounds nice, check [url=http://www.scrolls.com/]here for more info and to sign up on their newsletter and optionnaly opt to be an alpha tester.[/url] I opted to be an Alpha tester.

item.title: Scrolls (Mojang's new game)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:5, topic:388874”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=484694.msg3552427#msg3552427 date=1301624568]
Is the multiplayer as badly programmed as minecraft???
[/quote]

Fixed.[/quote]
No… the entire thing is horribly programmed.

Read full topic

Probably, but it’ll be just as addicting.

item.title: Scrolls (Mojang's new game)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Ah, I forgot!

We also announced our new game today! There’s not much info yet, but we’ll be getting an alpha version out as soon as we can!

Scrolls!

I figure most people reading this blog cares mostly about Minecraft development, so let me just say that I won’t be involved in the day to day development of Scrolls. Jakob, one of the guys I started Mojang with, is developing it, and has been since we started the company.

Still, I hope many of you will check it out once we’ve got some more stuff to show!

posted 4 weeks ago


It’s a new game which will be developed by Mojang, but thankfully the development won’t take Notch’s mind off MineCrat (according to him anyway). It sounds nice, check here for more info and to sign up on their newsletter and optionnaly opt to be an alpha tester.
I opted to be an Alpha tester.
